unnormalised: Hey there, social media enthusiasts! Ever wonder what's making waves online these days? The virality trends are shifting faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw negotiating traffic!
normalised: Hey there, social media enthusiasts! Ever wonder what is making waves online these days? The virality trends are shifting faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw negotiating traffic!

unnormalised: Right now, short-form video challenges are ruling the roost. Remember the "Jhootha Kahin Ka" challenge inspired by the Rishi Kapoor classic? That's the kind of evergreen content that can still spark a trend.
normalised: Right now, short-form video challenges are ruling the roost. Remember the "Jhootha Kahin Ka" challenge inspired by the Rishi Kapoor classic? That is the kind of evergreen content that can still spark a trend.

unnormalised: But novelty is key. Algorithms favour fresh takes and unexpected twists. Think less predictable dance-offs and more innovative uses of AR filters.
normalised: But novelty is key. Algorithms favor fresh takes and unexpected twists. Think less predictable dance-offs and more innovative uses of A R filters.

unnormalised: Experts at IIT Bombay are even analyzing virality patterns to help brands understand what clicks with the Gen-Z crowd.
normalised: Experts at I I T Bombay are even analyzing virality patterns to help brands understand what clicks with the Gen-Z crowd.

unnormalised: Plus, regional content is booming! Forget solely focusing on English; tapping into Hindi, Tamil, or Bengali can seriously expand your reach. Think of a funny skit in Hyderabadi slang - guaranteed views!
normalised: Plus, regional content is booming! Forget solely focusing on English; tapping into Hindi, Tamil, or Bengali can seriously expand your reach. Think of a funny skit in Hyderabadi slang - guaranteed views!

unnormalised: Influencer marketing is becoming hyper-local too. Micro-influencers with genuine connections to their communities are proving more effective than celebrity endorsements costing crores.
normalised: Influencer marketing is becoming hyper-local too. Micro-influencers with genuine connections to their communities are proving more effective than celebrity endorsements costing crores.

unnormalised: So, stay nimble, stay creative, and don't underestimate the power of a well-timed bhangra beat. The next big thing is just a click away!
normalised: So, stay nimble, stay creative, and do not underestimate the power of a well-timed bhangra beat. The next big thing is just a click away!
